r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $460.9K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Kgs Group Consulting Engineers. The average
  contract duration was 3.88 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $975.5K. The longest
  contract was 7.61 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $2.5M.
lookup_name: 'KGS GROUP CONSULTING ENGINEERS'

s431_number_of_contracts: '5'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '3'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '60%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '469%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '7'

s424_mean_duration: '3.88'
s421_mean_contract_value: '975.5K'
s425_max_duration: '7.61'
s422_max_contract_value: '2.5M'
